author: gfody
body:
This stopped working when I upgraded from PowerShell 5.1 to PowerShell 7 (which consequently upgraded PSReadLine from 1.2 to 2.0.0)

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
Set-PSReadLineKeyHandler -Key Ctrl+U -Function RevertLine
```

# Expected behavior
ctrl+u reverts the line

# Actual behavior
ctrl+u results in `^U`

# Environment data

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.0.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.0.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.17134
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @gfody Please report the issue to PSReadline repo.
